name: Reorder.js
body:
### Welcome to `Reorder.js`

Reordering, also known as _seriation_, and _linear ordering_, consists in assigning an order to rows/columns of
a table or to vertices of a network to reveal structures.  When visualizing a table as a heatmap or when visualizing a network as an adjacency matrix, finding a good order is essential to revealing high-level patterns in the data.  The literature on reordering algorithms is dense but few implementations are easily available. 

`Reorder.js` is a novel JavaScript library, provided in source code with a BSD license, which provides several of these algorithms and variants to facilitate the use, adoption, and experimentation of these algorithms.
